### Falafel burgers {.unnumbered #burger}

<center>![](falafel_burger_small.jpg){width=40%}</center>

A wonderfull, juicy burger with half the meat.

</br>

:::: {.blackbox data-latex=""}

<center>**Ingredients** (4-5 servings)</center>

::: {}

- 2/3 cup powdered falafel mix
- 1/4 cup water
- 1/2 onion
- 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
- 1 egg
- 1 lb ground beef
